ItemDesc: Upon use, the Max HP of all allies increases by <unbreak>10%</unbreak> plus an extra <unbreak>210</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: A time-tested recipe, crucial to the well-being of modern society. You get joy, sugar, fat, and a dash of optimism toward the future all in one goodness. "I spent all my life collecting Praise of High Morals, just so I can shake every soda bottle in the shop today."
